sentences.english: Lu, all went to watch for this state is slack.
sentences.chinese: 鲁国君臣整日前去观看，对国事就懈怠了。

sentences.english: He accused the government of slackness and complacency.
sentences.chinese: 他谴责政府的懈怠和自满。

sentences.english: He stood at full attention at the South Tower.
sentences.chinese: 他站在南塔旁，全神贯注，丝毫不敢懈怠。

sentences.english: It's the day-to-day work on Monday to Friday.
sentences.chinese: 周一到周五每天都不能懈怠。

sentences.english: In the past many years, Yan Hui studied very hard and had never shown laches.
sentences.chinese: 这些年来，颜回努力用功，从来没有懈怠之心。

sentences.english: I like playing games, but I actually not once idled in the study.
sentences.chinese: 我虽然喜欢玩游戏，但是我在学习上却不曾懈怠。

sentences.english: Laziness brings on deep sleep, and the shiftless man goes hungry.
sentences.chinese: 懒惰使人沉睡，懈怠的人必受饥饿。

sentences.english: In this self-interest there is the seed of negligence although there is constant preoccupation with oneself.
sentences.chinese: 这种全神贯注是受限的，所以是懈怠。

sentences.english: The challenge of such makes our software firm dare not have laches of a bit ground.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此类的挑战使我们软件厂商不敢有丝毫地懈怠。

sentences.english: Therefore, author holds the opinion that CHINA should regulate patent laches.
sentences.chinese: 所以，笔者认为，我们应当对专利懈怠行为予以规制。

sentences.english: Make sure you stay focused at work and don’t slack off.
sentences.chinese: 确保你持续将精力集中到工作上并且没有懈怠。

sentences.english: Because of this, Qi thought Lu was  timid and then relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 于是齐国军队认为鲁国胆小不敢进攻，便懈怠下来。

sentences.english: He did his best to govern the country well without any slackness .
sentences.chinese: 他努力治国，一点儿也不敢懈怠。

sentences.english: We start to slacken the minute we find excuses for ourself.
sentences.chinese: 人都是在原谅自己的那分钟开始懈怠。

sentences.english: We have even run into challenges that others never experienced. We cannot afford to slacken our efforts in the slightest if we are to live up the people's trust and expectations.
sentences.chinese: 面对人民的信任和期待，我们不敢有丝毫的懈怠。

sentences.english: Lives relaxed and in the spirit idles lets my pain not already.
sentences.chinese: 生活上的轻松和精神上的懈怠让我痛苦不已。

definition: to relax/to relax efforts/to slack off/to take it easy/complacent/undisciplined
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
